== Description ==

Update the details for a blog. Updates the blogs table for a given blog id.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php update_blog_details( $blog_id, $details ) ?>%%%
== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$blog_id|integer|Blog ID|required}}

{{Parameter|$details|array|Array of details keyed by blogs table field names.|optional|Array()}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||boolean|True if update succeeds, false otherwise.}}
